name: BatchExchange
description: BatchExchange - A decentralized exchange for any ERC20 token as a multi-token batch auction with uniform clearing prices. For more information visit: <https://github.com/gnosis/dex-contracts>.

functionDecorators.name: addToken
functionDecorators.description: Used to list a new token on the contract: Hence, making it available for exchange in an auction.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token to be listed. * Requirements: - `maxTokens` has not already been reached - `token` has not already been added.

functionDecorators.name: cancelOrders
functionDecorators.description: a user facing function used to cancel orders. If the order is valid for the batch that is currently being solved, it sets order expiry to that batchId. Otherwise it removes it from storage. Can be called multiple times (e.g. to eventually free storage once order is expired).

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user who cancels the orders.

parameterDecorators.name: orderIds
parameterDecorators.description: referencing the indices of user's orders to be cancelled.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: one-off call identifier (used when user is authorized via signature).

parameterDecorators.name: sig
parameterDecorators.description: signature data (used when user is authorized via signature) * Emits an {OrderCancellation} or {OrderDeletion} with sender's address and orderId.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: credits user with deposit amount on next epoch (given by getCurrentBatchId).

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user to be credited.

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: address of user who credits the `user`.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: address of token to be deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: number of token(s) to be credited to user's account.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: one-off call identifier (used when user is authorized via signature).

parameterDecorators.name: sig
parameterDecorators.description: signature data (used when user is authorized via signature) * Transaction must be authorized by `from` directly or via signature. * The contract should be approved by `from` for transfer `amount` of `token`. * Emits an {Deposit} event with relevant deposit information. * Requirements: - token transfer to contract is successfull.

functionDecorators.name: getBalance
functionDecorators.description: fetches and returns user's balance.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: address of ERC20 token return Current `token` balance of `user`'s account.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentBatchId
functionDecorators.description: getter function to determine current auction id. return current batchId.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentObjectiveValue
functionDecorators.description: gets the objective value of currently winning solution.

functionDecorators.name: getEncodedOrders
functionDecorators.description: View returning all byte-encoded sell orders.

functionDecorators.name: getEncodedUserOrders
functionDecorators.description: View returning all byte-encoded sell orders for specified user.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user whose orders are being queried.

functionDecorators.name: getEncodedUserOrdersPaginated
functionDecorators.description: View returning all byte-encoded sell orders for specified user.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user whose orders are being queried.

parameterDecorators.name: offset
parameterDecorators.description: uint determining the starting orderIndex.

parameterDecorators.name: pageSize
parameterDecorators.description: uint determining the count of elements to be viewed.

functionDecorators.name: getEncodedUsersPaginated
functionDecorators.description: View returning byte-encoded sell orders in paginated form.

parameterDecorators.name: previousPageUser
parameterDecorators.description: address of last user received in the previous page (address(0) for first page).

parameterDecorators.name: previousPageUserOffset
parameterDecorators.description: the number of orders received for the last user on the previous page (0 for first page).

parameterDecorators.name: pageSize
parameterDecorators.description: uint determining the count of orders to be returned per page.

functionDecorators.name: getPendingDeposit
functionDecorators.description: getter function used to display pending deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: address of ERC20 token return amount and batchId of deposit's transfer if any (else 0).

functionDecorators.name: getPendingWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: getter function used to display pending withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: address of ERC20 token return amount and batchId when withdraw was requested if any (else 0).

functionDecorators.name: getSecondsRemainingInBatch
functionDecorators.description: used to determine how much time is left in a batch return seconds remaining in current batch.

functionDecorators.name: getUsersPaginated
functionDecorators.description: View returning all byte-encoded users in paginated form.

parameterDecorators.name: previousPageUser
parameterDecorators.description: address of last user received in last pages (address(0) for first page).

parameterDecorators.name: pageSize
parameterDecorators.description: uint determining the count of users to be returned per page.

functionDecorators.name: hasToken
functionDecorators.description: View returning a bool attesting whether token was already added.

parameterDecorators.name: addr
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token to be checked.

functionDecorators.name: hasValidWithdrawRequest
functionDecorators.description: Used to determine if user has a valid pending withdraw request of specific token.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: address of ERC20 token return true if `user` has valid withdraw request for `token`, otherwise false.

functionDecorators.name: placeOrders
functionDecorators.description: A user facing function used to place limit sell orders in auction with expiry defined by batchId Note that parameters are passed as arrays and the indices correspond to each order.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user who places the orders.

parameterDecorators.name: buyTokens
parameterDecorators.description: ids of tokens to be bought.

parameterDecorators.name: sellTokens
parameterDecorators.description: ids of tokens to be sold.

parameterDecorators.name: validFroms
parameterDecorators.description: batchIds representing order's validity start time.

parameterDecorators.name: validUntils
parameterDecorators.description: batchIds representing order's expiry.

parameterDecorators.name: buyAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: relative minimum amount of requested buy amounts.

parameterDecorators.name: sellAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: maximum amounts of sell token to be exchanged.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: one-off call identifier (used when user is authorized via signature).

parameterDecorators.name: sig
parameterDecorators.description: signature data (used when user is authorized via signature).

functionDecorators.name: replaceOrders
functionDecorators.description: A user facing wrapper to cancel and place new orders in the same transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user who replaces the orders.

parameterDecorators.name: cancellations
parameterDecorators.description: indices of orders to be cancelled.

parameterDecorators.name: buyTokens
parameterDecorators.description: ids of tokens to be bought in new orders.

parameterDecorators.name: sellTokens
parameterDecorators.description: ids of tokens to be sold in new orders.

parameterDecorators.name: validFroms
parameterDecorators.description: batchIds representing order's validity start time in new orders.

parameterDecorators.name: validUntils
parameterDecorators.description: batchIds represnnting order's expiry in new orders.

parameterDecorators.name: buyAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: relative minimum amount of requested buy amounts in new orders.

parameterDecorators.name: sellAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: maximum amounts of sell token to be exchanged in new orders.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: one-off call identifier (used when user is authorized via signature).

parameterDecorators.name: sig
parameterDecorators.description: signature data (used when user is authorized via signature).

functionDecorators.name: requestWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Signals and initiates user's intent to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user who claims a withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: address of token to be withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: number of token(s) to be withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: batchId
parameterDecorators.description: state index at which request is to be made, must be greater than or equal to the current batch.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: one-off call identifier (used when user is authorized via signature).

parameterDecorators.name: sig
parameterDecorators.description: signature data (used when user is authorized via signature) * Transaction must be authorized by `user` directly or via signature. * If `to` is zero address then it is assumed that `token` contract supports burning in shape of OpenZeppelin ERC20Burnable contract, and in this case on further withdraw burning is performed instead of transfer to `to`. See https://docs.openzeppelin.com/contracts/3.x/api/token/erc20#ERC20Burnable for details of burnable token implementation. * Emits an {WithdrawRequest} event with relevent request information.

functionDecorators.name: setFeeTaker
functionDecorators.description: Used to change a fee taker.

parameterDecorators.name: newAddress
parameterDecorators.description: New fee taker address.

functionDecorators.name: setMaxTouchedOrders
functionDecorators.description: Used to change MAX_TOUCHED_ORDERS value.

parameterDecorators.name: ordersNum
parameterDecorators.description: New maximum touched orders in a batch.

functionDecorators.name: submitSolution
functionDecorators.description: a solver facing function called for auction settlement.

parameterDecorators.name: batchId
parameterDecorators.description: index of auction solution is referring to.

parameterDecorators.name: owners
parameterDecorators.description: array of addresses corresponding to touched orders.

parameterDecorators.name: orderIds
parameterDecorators.description: array of order indices used in parallel with owners to identify touched order.

parameterDecorators.name: buyVolumes
parameterDecorators.description: executed buy amounts for each order identified by index of owner-orderId arrays.

parameterDecorators.name: prices
parameterDecorators.description: list of prices for touched tokens indexed by next parameter.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenIdsForPrice
parameterDecorators.description: price[i] is the price for the token with tokenID tokenIdsForPrice[i].

functionDecorators.name: tokenAddressToIdMap
functionDecorators.description: View returning ID of listed tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: addr
parameterDecorators.description: address of listed token.

functionDecorators.name: tokenIdToAddressMap
functionDecorators.description: View returning address of listed token by ID.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: tokenId as stored, via BiMap, within the contract.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Claims pending withdraw - can be called on behalf of others.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: address of user who withdraw is being claimed. * Emits an {Withdraw} event stating that `user` withdrew `amount` of `token` * Requirements: - withdraw was requested in previous epoch - token was received from exchange in current auction batch.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: address of token to be withdrawn.
